description: If you're looking to try something new for breakfast, try this vegan chickpea omelette. It's easy to make, versatile and made with wholesome ingredients. Perfect for a slow weekend breakfast in bed or brunch, gluten-free & oil-free.
keywords: avocado, chickpea omelette, earth of maria, easy, Gluten-Free, Mushrooms, Oil free, Plantbased, sweet potato, to move, Vegan Breakfast
name: How To Make A Vegan Chickpea Omelette With Tamari Mushrooms

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpea flour, ground flaxseeds, nutritional yeast, turmeric, cumin, plant based milk, and maple syrup. Blend until smooth. You can also whisk by hand, but that way it will take longer to get rid of any clumps.
Heat a non-stick frying pan over a low-medium heat. You may need to add a little bit of oil to grease the pan, but I find that with a good non-stick surface this is not necessary.
Pour in around 1/2 cup of the batter per omelette. Cover and allow to cook for 4-5 minutes, until fully cooked through and crispy around the edges.
